text: Sadaka [1] to sudhu [2] phakira, misakina [3] o sadaka adayera kaje niyukta karmacaridera jan'ya [4], yadera antara akrsta karate haya tadera jan'ya [5], dasamuktite [6], rna bharakrantadera jan'ya [7], allah‌ra pathe [8] o musaphiradera [9] jan'ya. Eta allah‌ra paksa theke nirdharita [10]. Ara allah‌ sarbajna, prajnamaya
